name: cmdfarm
description:
In this game you design and tend a small farm. Harvesting crops earns money that can be used to buy more crops and other stuff for the farm. Crops all have different growth rates, yields and sell values.

This is a very early version of the game. Grow times and prices need to be balanced better. I plan to add a 'rot' mechanic and I have a few other ideas that I might add. The game is pretty easy in its current state.
